title: Elizabeth Holmes Case Takes On More Drama Ahead of Sentencing
description: The founder of Theranos, the failed blood testing start-up, asked for a new trial after a surprise visit from a key witness to her house.

title: Kanye West Agrees to Buy Parler, Company Says
description: The agreement in principle to buy the social media service comes days after Twitter and Instagram restricted the rapper’s account for violating its terms.

title: The Rise of Salem Media, a Conservative Radio Juggernaut
description: Salem Media, which counts the conservative personalities Charlie Kirk and Sebastian Gorka among its radio hosts, has taken a pointed stance ahead of the midterm elections.
